product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Care instructions
product.description: Provides guidance for product upkeep, such as hand wash or dry clean only

product.name: Sleeve length type
product.description: Specifies the style of sleeves on clothing items, such as short or sleeveless

product.name: Neckline
product.description: Used to describe the neck shape of a garment, such as V-neck or boat

product.name: Top length type
product.description: Defines the length of tops or shirts, like crop top or long

product.name: Clothing features
product.description: Describes unique properties of apparel, such as water resistant or wrinkle resistant

product.name: Closure type
product.description: Defines the method used to fasten or secure a product, such as zipper or buckles

product.name: Shoe fit
product.description: Defines the width of footwear, such as narrow or wide

product.name: Occasion style
product.description: Helps categorize products based on occasion, e.g. casual, dress

product.name: Footwear material
product.description: Specifies the type of material used in footwear, such as suede or rubber

product.name: Shoe features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of shoes, such as waterproof or lightweight

product.name: Sneaker style
product.description: Identifies the design or type of sneakers, such as athletic or high-top

product.name: Toe style
product.description: Defines the shape or design of a shoe's toe, such as open or pointed

product.name: Flat shoe style
product.description: Identifies the specific design of flat shoes, such as ballet or espadrilles

product.name: Fit
product.description: Describes the fit of a garment, typically pant shape; e.g. skinny leg, wide

product.name: Waist rise
product.description: Indicates where on the waist a garment sits, like low, medium or high

product.name: Pants length type
product.description: Used to defines the length of pants, such as cropped or long

product.name: Shoe size
product.description: Used to define the size of footwear, e.g. Extra large (XL), 9.5

product.name: Accessory size
product.description: Defines the size of an accessory product, such as one size or compact

product.name: Jewelry type
product.description: Distinguishes between types of jewelry, such as fine or imitation jewelry

product.name: Jewelry material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in jewelry items, such as gold or enamel

product.name: Outerwear clothing features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of outerwear, like insulated or waterproof

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Season
product.description: Indicates the season the product is best suited for, such as summer or fall

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 2
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.
